blogPost.excerpt: PastePal is the best universal pasteboard manager for Mac, iPhone and iPad. It is safe, fast and honor your privacy settings with a beautiful design.

blogPost.title: PastePal 2.0 - Best universal pasteboard for Mac, iPhone and iPad
blogPost.author: Khoa Pham

localize.description: PastePal是Mac、iPhone和iPad上最好的通用粘贴板管理器。它是安全的，快速的，尊重你的隐私设置与美丽的设计。
localize.tagline: 适用于Mac、iPhone和iPad的最佳通用粘贴板。

localize.description: PastePal是Mac、iPhone和iPad上最好的通用粘貼板管理器。它是安全的，快速的，尊重你的隱私設置與美麗的設計。
localize.tagline: 適用於Mac、iPhone和iPad的最佳通用粘貼板。

previous.excerpt: Kafkai is a machine-learning algorithm writes articles from scratch. There is no scraping or spinning happening in the background. It allows you to get unique content for cents instead of dollars. It's perfect for bulk content production that SEOs require.
previous.title: Kafkai 2.0 - Unique and readable content generated by AI

localize.description: Kafkai是一个机器学习算法从头开始写文章。后台没有发生任何刮擦或旋转。它允许你以美分而不是美元的价格获得独特的内容。它非常适合SEO所需要的批量内容生产。
localize.tagline: 由人工智能产生的独特和可读的内容

localize.description: Kafkai是一個機器學習算法從頭開始寫文章。後臺沒有發生任何刮擦或旋轉。它允許你以美分而不是美元的價格獲得獨特的內容。它非常適合SEO所需要的批量內容生產。
localize.tagline: 由人工智能產生的獨特和可讀的內容

next.title: DataMool - Predictive property investment opportunities. Worldwide.
